name: Color Rush (albertox7, xavialbizu)
description:
Controls:

W/A/S/D : Move

Mouse: Camera control

Space Bar: Paint hose

Game:

The goal is to fill the rooms with your color, the one who has painted the most at the end wins the game.

Notes:

The music is loud, be careful

Sometimes the paint takes time to be visible at the begining of the game, don´t worry it appears after a while.
